attributes.action: show support for the sport of Beer Basketball.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime minister to support the fledging sport of Beer Basketball. For the sport to succeed, the players of the game need to have their own facilities and a regular competition, with the PM's backing the organizers of the sport will be able to achieve these goals.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
